channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Order Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Order Management

item.title: CVE-2018-2954|2024-08-05T04:36:39.066Z -- oracle%20corporation -- order%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Order Management component of Oracle E-Business Suite (subcomponent: Product Diagnostic Tools). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1, 12.1.2, 12.1.3, 12.2.3, 12.2.4, 12.2.5, 12.2.6 and 12.2.7. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Oracle Order Management executes to compromise Oracle Order Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle Order Management. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.0 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
